member.name: M:JValueMasker.Extensions.JContainerExtensions.MaskValues``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.StringComparison,System.String)
member.summary: Masks the values of specified properties on a JContainer. Pass in a list of the properties to mask. The values of all specified properties will be masked, even those on nested JContainers.
